item.title: B.o.B - Nothin' On You - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Nothin' On You by B.o.B from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Cm7, Dm, D♯maj7, F.

item.title: Ben E. King - Stand By Me - Key of G - Dr. A
item.description: Play along video for the song Stand By Me by Ben E. King from the channel Dr. A. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Johnny Cash - Folsom Prison Blues - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Folsom Prison Blues by Johnny Cash from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D7, G, G7.

item.title: Fats Domino - Blueberry Hill - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Blueberry Hill by Fats Domino from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: B7, Bdim7, C, C7, E7, F, Fm, G7.

item.title: The Spaniels - Goodnight Sweetheart - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Goodnight Sweetheart by The Spaniels from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Cm, D7, Em, Em7, G, G7.

item.title: The Tokens - The Lion Sleeps Tonight - Key of C - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song The Lion Sleeps Tonight by The Tokens from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.title: Gene Chandler - Duke Of Earl - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Duke Of Earl by Gene Chandler from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: War - Why Can't We Be Friends? - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Why Can't We Be Friends? by War from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B♭, C, C7, E7, Em, F, G, G7, Gm.

item.description: Play along video for the song Mustang Sally by The Commitments from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.title: Queen Naija - Butterflies - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Butterflies by Queen Naija from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: Dmaj7, Em7, F♯m, Gmaj7.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Faith - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Faith by Stevie Wonder from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: C7, D7, G7.
